description: CONSOLIDING MALARIA CONTROL EFFORTS FOR MALARIA ELIMINATION IN SAO TOMÉ AND PRINCIPE

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Main goal:to further reduce malaria morbidity and mortality toward malaria elimination.
The project aims to consolidate the reduction in malaria burden though the continuation of current antimalaria efforts and futher institutional strengthening, followed by intensified surveillance and other interventions leading to the elimination of malaria in São Tome and Principe in the future.This efforts will benefit the entire population, helping the power as the main group affected by the disease.
subproject.title: Consoliding Malaria Control Ef
